tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP want) (NP (NP (NN coffee)) (: ...) (NP (NP (CD 2) (NNS days)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT a) (NN row))))) (PP (IN without) (NP (PRP it)))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [want/VBP nsubj>I/PRP dobj>[coffee/NN punct>.../: dep>[days/NNS nummod>2/CD nmod:in>[row/NN case>in/IN det>a/DT]]] nmod:without>[it/PRP case>without/IN] punct>./.]
